summary: This document is a billing statement for an AT&T Wireless account belonging to Martin Golick, detailing charges for the billing cycle ending on September 14, 2004. It includes a summary of monthly charges, usage details, and payment instructions. This document contains detailed voice usage records for an account belonging to Martin Golick, including call times, durations, and locations. It highlights numerous calls made from Palm Beach, Florida, and other locations, indicating frequent communication patterns. This document details the voice usage activity for a phone account associated with Martin Golick, including numerous incoming and outgoing calls made from various locations, primarily in Florida. The report includes timestamps, call durations, and descriptions of the calls, indicating a high volume of communication during the specified dates. This document contains detailed voice usage records for the account of Martin Golick, including call times, durations, and locations. It provides insights into communication patterns relevant to the Epstein case, particularly focusing on calls made to and from Palm Beach, Florida, and other locations.
